description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file with a suspicious extension
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: File With Suspicious Extension Downloaded Via Bitsadmin
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\bitsadmin.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"bitsadmin.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \/transfer\ *" OR "*\ \/create\ *" OR "*\ \/addfile\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*.7z*" OR "*.asax*" OR "*.ashx*" OR "*.asmx*" OR "*.asp*" OR "*.aspx*" OR "*.bat*" OR "*.cfm*" OR "*.cgi*" OR "*.chm*" OR "*.cmd*" OR "*.dll*" OR "*.gif*" OR "*.jpeg*" OR "*.jpg*" OR "*.jsp*" OR "*.jspx*" OR "*.log*" OR "*.png*" OR "*.ps1*" OR "*.psm1*" OR "*.rar*" OR "*.scf*" OR "*.sct*" OR "*.txt*" OR "*.vbe*" OR "*.vbs*" OR "*.war*" OR "*.wsf*" OR "*.wsh*" OR "*.xll*" OR "*.zip*"))
